fullplot: The police are called to a murder scene and quickly discover that the murderer, the victim's son, is holed up in his house with two hostages. Through a series of interviews with both the murderer's fiancèe and his theatre director the police piece together a picture of a man losing touch with reality.
plot: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.
title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
